name: The Wizard (notSailor)
description:
It is a school project for Unity, and first game I did with my friend. You can play for Free. If you comments it would be very helpful.

Damage which you deal depends on your element. If you attack the red guy with fire, it will increase its health for example.

(If game is too difficult for you, try other elements to attack. If still hard, then you can write "tyu" and you will damage more.)

If you leave some comments, it will encourage to make better games.

Have Fun.
